a-long.name: strong long
a-long.note: Ônli euzd if aol uther kontext reulz feil.

a-long-medial.name: strong long
a-long-medial.condition: It iz strest, plecet befôr e singel konsonant, and then folloud bai thi last vauel of thi wurd.

a-long-final.name: strong long
a-long-final.condition: It iz strest, and plecet at thi end ov e wurd or morfîm.

a-long-prevocalic.name: strong long
a-long-prevocalic.condition: It iz strest, and plecet befôr anuther vauel.

a-short.name: strong short
a-short.condition: It iz strest, and follouing it thêr ar at liest 2 vauelz in thi wurd.

a-short-medial.name: strong short
a-short-medial.condition: It iz strest, folloud bai at liest twu konsonants. (J and X kaunt az dubbel)

a-short-medial-lengthened.name: strong short lengthened
a-short-medial-lengthened.condition: It iz strest, folloud bai at liest twu konsonants. Thi lengthend pronunciêcion iz not markt.

a-short-final.name: strong short
a-short-final.condition: It iz strest, and iz thi last vauel ov thi wurd, folloud bai at liest won konsonant.

a-short-final-lengthened.name: strong short lengthened
a-short-final-lengthened.condition: It iz strest, and iz thi last vauel ov thi wurd, folloud bai at liest won konsonant. Thi lengthend pronunciêcion iz not markt.

a-weak-silent.name: weak sailent
a-weak-silent.condition: It iz unstrest, befôr L or R, raiht after thi strest silabel in a wurd longer than 2 silabelz.

ar-initial.name: strong
ar-initial.condition: It iz unstrest, plecet at thi begining ov e wurd or morfîm, and folloud bai e konsonant.

ar-derhoticized.name: strong derôticaizd
ar-derhoticized.condition: It iz strest, and plecet befôr e vauel, and thêr ar multipel vauelz follouing.

ci.condition: Thêr iz an unstrest vauel follouing.

ce.condition: At thi end ov e wurd or morfîm.

di.condition: Thêr iz an unstrest vauel follouing.

d-intervocalic.condition: In betwên two vauelz, whêr thi priciding won iz strest.

dd-intervocalic.condition: In betwên two vauelz, whêr thi priciding won iz strest.

e-short-final.condition: It iz strest, and iz thi last vauel ov thi wurd, folloud bai at liest won konsonant.

e-weak-initial.name: wiek
e-weak-initial.condition: It iz unstrest, and at thi beginnings ov wurds.

e-weak-presonorant.name: weak redeucet
e-weak-presonorant.condition: It iz unstrest, and plecet befôr an L, M, or N.

e-weak-reduced.name: weak redeucet
e-weak-reduced.condition: It iz unstrest, raiht after thi strest silabel in a wurd longer than 2 silabelz.

e-weak-silent.name: weak sailent
e-weak-silent.condition: It iz unstrest, befôr L, raiht after thi strest silabel in a wurd longer than 2 silabelz.

er-long.name: strong long

er-long-medial.name: strong long

er-weak-silent.name: weak sailent
er-weak-silent.condition: It iz unstrest, raiht after thi strest silabel in a wurd longer than 2 silabelz.

ei.note: Replecez instancez ov môr than won orijinal vauel.

eir.note: Replecez instancez ov môr than won orijinal vauel.

f-z.note: Euzd in plece ov orijinal f.

gi.condition: Thêr iz an unstrest vauel follouing.

h-silent.condition: It iz follouing e vauel, which mei interpret it az e konsonant.

i-long.name: strong long
i-long.note: Ônli euzd if aol uther kontext reulz feil. Replecez instancez ov e singel vauel or dubbel "ee".

i-long-medial.condition: It iz strest, plecet befôr e singel konsonant, and then folloud bai thi last vauel of thi wurd.

ier.note: Replecez instancez ov môr than won orijinal vauel.

o-short-final.condition: It iz strest, and iz thi last vauel ov thi wurd, folloud bai at liest won konsonant.

o-short-final-centered.condition: It iz strest, and iz thi last vauel ov thi wurd, folloud bai at liest won konsonant. Thi centerd pronunciêcion iz not markt.

or.name: strong
or.note: Thi cirkumflex iz often plecet abuv, but thi pronunciêcion of "or" and "ôr" iz ônli different in e mainoriti ov akcents that hav thi "horse-hoarse" distinkcion.

or-initial.name: strong
or-initial.condition: It iz unstrest, plecet at thi begining ov e wurd or morfîm, and folloud bai e konsonant.

or-derhoticized.name: strong derôticaizd

our.note: Replecez instancez ov môr than won orijinal vauel.

s-voiced.name: voicet

th-voiced.name: voicet
th-voiced.note: Thi voicing distinktion woz dîmd unimportant deu tu thi lak ov minimal peirz.

wh.note: Thi pronunciêcion of "wh" and "w" iz ônli different in thi mainoriti ov akcents that hâv thi "whine-wine" distinkcion.

zi.condition: Thêr iz an unstrest vauel follouing.

reduced.name: redeucet
reduced.condition: Thi iregeular pronunciêcion ov thi letter kumz from e strong redukcion.

note: Deu tu e disagriment betwîn akcents and thi wurd dîmd tû kommon, won iregeular spelling iz chôzen.

letter.condition: Pronunciêcion ov e letter in thi alfabet.
